name: Marble Kingdom (itch)
description:
A sandbox marble run builder.

How to Play

Move Camera
WASD / Arrow Keys
SprintHold Left Shift
Rotate Camera
Hold Right Mouse Button and move the mouse
Place a Block
Click (LMB) a block from the selection at the bottom of the screen. Then move the mouse to where you want to place it and click (LMB) again when you see the green preview.
Rotate Block
Press R when you see the green preview of the block.

Flip Block
Press F when you see the green preview of the block
Delete Block
Click (LMB) the block you want to delete. (There is 1 indestructible block below the marble spawn)
Spawn Marble
Click (LMB) the marble at the bottom right of the screen.
Quit Game
ESC
